overview: The dirty old men of TeensForCash.com are at it again, seeking out more desperate teen bimbos willing to spread for the right amount of bread. In need of everything from some Christmas cash to a new bong, another half-dozen young sluts desperate for spending money line up in Volume 2 innocence for a mere handful of bills!
tagline: Every Girl Has Her Price! We Find Our How Depraved These Teens Will Get For A Pair Of Rich, Dirty Old Men!
title: Teens For Cash 2
